bio.1: I blend web performance and creative development to craft digital experiences that stand out. My passion lies in building efficient, scalable solutions where code quality meets an elegant design
bio.2: As a Full Stack Developer, I thrive on transforming complex challenges into clean, performant applications. My approach combines technical expertise with a keen eye for optimization and user experience
bio.3: When not immersed in programming, I'm trying to learn music or understand how things work. After all, technology is just a tool to enhance our real-world experiences and bring our ideas to life. It's the impact on people's lives that truly matters.

techStack.title: Stack
techStack.description: Some of the software and technologies I use on a daily basis
